title: Anyone want to trade T206 HOFers?
author: David R

posts.post_title: Anyone want to trade T206 HOFers?
posts.post_content:
I have the following to trade (w or w/o cash either way to even trade):

Brown portrait (SC 150) SGC 40
Jennings both hands (SC 350) SGC 40
McGraw no hat (Pied 150) SGC 30 -- looks better has stamp name on back
Bender trees (Sovereign 350) SGC 10 - looks better has # written on back
Bender no trees PSA 3
Marquard throwing PSA 2
Evers bat  (Pied 350) (Chi) SGC 10 -- excellent front, paper loss back

I am looking for:

Waddell portrait SGC 40 or 50
Walsh SGC 40 or 50
Wallace or J. Collins SGC 50
Any with these backs: AB 350 frame, Carolina Brights, Pied 350-460, Lenox

I also have this Lajoie Portrait (SGC 30 now) that I would trade for a nice Lajoie throwing or batting.  This is severely undergraded -- SGC told me there was a touch of paper loss on the back right bottom frame just above and to the right of the "y" in "quality."
 
Please email [url]dreis114@hotmail.com[/url].  I have most of the others scanned if anyone is interested.

Thanks for looking.

David R.
